text: The tennis competition at the 1991 European Youth Olympic Days was held from 18 to 20 July.EYOF Archive 1991 Tennis results The events took place in Brussels, Belgium. Girls and boys born 1976 or 1977 or later participated in the event. Singles competition only was presented. ==Medal summary== {| |- |Men's singles | | | |- |Women's singles | | | |} ==References== Tennis European Youth Olympic Days 1991 European Youth Olympic Days
title: Tennis at the 1991 European Youth Olympic Days
